name: ❀Catch the paw!❀
description:
Hi! Welcome to ,,❀Catch the paw!❀" game!

❀Instructions:

 1.  You can change the music by pressing keys 1 or 2 

2. Press the Start button

 3. All you have to do is collect your paws using the tast a and d or left arrow and right arrow. If one of them touches the carpet, your life will be reduced 

❀CAREFUL!! YOU HAVE ONLY 3 LIVES 

4. If you lose and want to continue, just click the Try Again button 

I also tried to display the score you got, but also the highest score in the world.

❀If you have ideas on how I could improve the project, write in the comments!I hope you like the game I created! Enjoy watching!
